bugs.summary: Frequent "WebProgress Ignored: no longer current window global" warnings
6,000 instances of "NS_ENSURE_TRUE(browserChrome) failed" emitted from dom/base/BarProps.cpp during macosx1015-64-qr debug testing
49,000 instances of "NS_ENSURE_TRUE(doc) failed" emitted from dom/workers/WorkerPrivate.cpp during linux2404-64 debug testing
libyuv is unconditionally built with LASX, potentially triggering a SIGILL on non-LASX LoongArch processors
Using CanvasRenderingContext2D: filter blur() breaks canvas rendering
Let hardware WebRender dithering of gradient ride the trains
Set pref gfx.webrender.wait-gpu-finished.disabled to false to avoid too many GPU tasks
Unify the fetching for static/dynamic import in ModuleLoaderBase::HostLoadImportedModules
Implement opt-in prompt for Yelp online suggestion
Move ktlint settings of GeckoView to .editconfig
Install npm binary on Windows and Mac machines
